title: Evidence.Collect.Input
description: Input messageType for the Evidence.Collect capability.

evidence_type.description: Type of evidence being collected (e.g., promotional_engagement, misappropriation, impersonation).

source_platform.description: Platform where the evidence was found.

content_ref.description: Reference to the content (URL, post ID, or opaque identifier).

proof_hash.description: Hash of the captured content for integrity verification.

metadata.description: Additional metadata such as screenshot info, engagement details, or platform-specific fields.

context.description: Optional context from the requesting agent.
